Backbones and heads

Overview

MIR includes reusable backbones and task heads used across registration and self-supervised tasks.

Backbones

  • MIR.models.Swin_Transformer

  • MIR.models.Deformable_Swin_Transformer

  • MIR.models.Deformable_Swin_Transformer_v2

Heads

  • MIR.models.Segmentation_Heads

  • MIR.models.Synthesis_Heads

  • MIR.models.Selfsupervised_Learning_Heads
